User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the AgriLink AI platform, either a farmer or a retailer.

city.description: The city where the user is located.

state.description: The state or province where the user is located.

country.description: The country where the user is located.

companyName.description: The name of the user's company, if applicable.

trustScore.description: A numerical score representing the user's trustworthiness.

avatar.description: URL to the user's avatar image.

location.description: A combined string of city and country for display purposes.

Crop.title: Crop
Crop.description: Represents a crop listing uploaded by a farmer.

id.description: Unique identifier for the crop listing.

farmerId.description: Reference to the User who created the crop listing.

quantity.description: The quantity of the crop available (e.g., in tons).

price.description: The price per unit of the crop.

location.description: The location where the crop is grown.

city.description: The city where the crop is located.

country.description: The country where the crop is located.

images.description: URLs of images of the crop.

qualityNotes.description: AI-generated quality notes about the crop.

listingDate.description: The date when the crop listing was created.

status.description: The current status of the crop listing (e.g., 'Listed', 'Sold').

aiVerified.description: Whether the quality notes were AI-generated.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile data. Accessible only by the authenticated user with matching userId.
